# 0nMCP â€” Universal AI API Orchestrator
> 59 services. 1,385+ capabilities. Turn it 0n.

0nMCP is an open-source MCP server that connects AI to 59 services through a single interface.
Install: npx 0nmcp
npm: https://npmjs.com/package/0nmcp
GitHub: https://github.com/0nork/0nMCP
Website: https://0nmcp.com

## Services (59)
Gmail, Slack, Google Calendar, Google Sheets, Google Drive, Zoom, Microsoft 365, Notion, Discord, Twilio, WhatsApp Business, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, X (Twitter), TikTok, Pinterest, Mailchimp, SendGrid, Resend, Typeform, Google Forms, JotForm, Stripe, Shopify, QuickBooks, Xero, Square, FreshBooks, 0nMCP CRM (245 tools), HubSpot, Salesforce, Pipedrive, Trello, Asana, Monday.com, ClickUp, Airtable, Calendly, Google Tasks, Todoist, Canva, DocuSign, Dropbox, Zendesk, Intercom, Freshdesk, WordPress, Webflow, Wix, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, OpenAI, Anthropic (Claude), GitHub, Supabase, MongoDB, Linear, Jira

RocketOpp LLC (mike@rocketopp.com)
